description: This Dart file defines an EventsProvider class that manages the state related to events within a Flutter application. It handles loading, filtering, adding, updating, and deleting event data by interacting with a DataSource, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: EventsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based class managing the state of maintenance events, including loading, filtering, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: loadEvents
methods.description: Asynchronously loads all events from the data source and applies current filters.

methods.name: filterEvents
methods.description: Filters the list of events based on the provided status, updating the filtered events list.

methods.name: _applyFilters
methods.description: Private method that applies current filters to the events list and sorts them by scheduled date.

methods.name: addEvent
methods.description: Adds a new event to the data source and reloads the events list.

methods.name: updateEvent
methods.description: Updates an existing event in the data source and reloads the events list.

methods.name: deleteEvent
methods.description: Deletes an event by ID from the data source and reloads the events list.
